XrdRewardLimit.title: Raise Your XRD Reward Limit
XrdRewardLimit.content: Before claiming more XRD, we’d appreciate answering a few quick questions in the quest:

AccountAlreadyRegistered.title: Account Already Registered
AccountAlreadyRegistered.content: You seem to be already a RadQuest user - please log in with the Persona you originally used to continue.

HighDemand.title: RadQuest is experiencing very high demand.
HighDemand.content: Your request is still in progress, but you may need to come back later.

AccountLocked.title: Account Suspended
AccountLocked.content: There was suspicious activity on this account. Feel free to keep looking around RadQuest, but you can no longer receive rewards and certain features may not work.

NetworkCongestion.title: RadQuest is experiencing very high demand.
NetworkCongestion.content: If you have problems completing quests or making claims, please try again later.
